com.cscguru.client.map

Class AreaMarker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cscguru.client.map.AreaMarker

  • public class AreaMarker
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles zoning on the map. Allows the game to be able to detect when the player has entered into a new zone and to display the relevant information on the GUI.
    Author:
    Bryan Bennett
